title: Brainwash and Repeat (with Bianca Cristovao)
itunes:title: Brainwash and Repeat (with Bianca Cristovao)
description:
Was hair relaxer invented by white people to brainwash black people? Langston and guest Bianca Cristovao (Loving in America) talk about the science of hair relaxers and how the chemicals seep into our brains. Is it for mind control, or even worse?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: hair products, stand up, stand up comedy, black conspiracy theories, conspiracy theories, mind control, brainwashing, natural hair
